description: Operating and securing production-grade Kubernetes platforms, administering Harbor and Ceph/Rook, automating infrastructure with Terraform, Ansible and Helm, and enabling GitOps practices.

Led a 6-member DevOps team managing a containerized DevOps tooling platform (Kubernetes RKE2), overseeing the application lifecycle and acting as the technical client liaison for onboarding and ongoing follow-up.
Automated K3s and RKE2 cluster provisioning using Ansible and GitLab CI, with DevOps tools deployed via Helm charts and managed through Argo CD.
Designed and operated serverless APIs on AWS, industrialized CI/CD pipelines using GitLab CI and CloudFormation, and embedded DevSecOps best practices.
Implemented an ELK-based monitoring stack, automated agent deployment and dashboard creation, and enhanced log coverage while improving the alert signal-to-noise ratio.
